mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id, u.nickname, cg.campground_name AS campground_name, r.checkin_time, r.checkout_time, r.reservation_status, r.refund_status, r.refund_type, r.checkin_status FROM reservations r JOIN users u ON r.provider_code = u.provider_code AND r.provider_user_id = u.provider_user_id JOIN campground_sites s ON r.reservation_site = s.site_id JOIN campgrounds cg ON s.campground_id = cg.campground_id

SELECT r.reservation_id, u.nickname, cg.campground_name AS campground_name, r.reservation_site, r.reservation_date, r.checkin_time, r.checkout_time, r.reservation_status, r.refund_status, r.refund_type, r.checkin_status, r.custom_reason, u.phone AS phone, IFNULL(r.cancel_reason, '-') AS cancel_reason, r.requested_at, r.refunded_at FROM reservations r JOIN users u ON r.provider_code = u.provider_code AND r.provider_user_id = u.provider_user_id JOIN campground_sites s ON r.reservation_site = s.site_id JOIN campground_zones z ON s.zone_id = z.zone_id JOIN campgrounds cg ON z.campground_id = cg.campground_id WHERE r.reservation_id = #{reservationId}
mapper.update: UPDATE reservations SET reservation_status = #{reservationStatus}, cancel_reason = #{cancelReason}, custom_reason = #{customReason}, refund_status = #{refundStatus} WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId}
